statements: SELECT * FROM budget_tracking ORDER BY random_id ASC;
SELECT department_name, allocated_budget FROM budget_tracking WHERE expenditure > 1000;
SELECT SUM(allocated_budget) AS total_budget FROM budget_tracking;
SELECT * FROM budget_tracking WHERE department_name = 'Marketing' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, SUM(expenditure) AS total_expenditure FROM budget_tracking GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM budget_tracking WHERE expenditure > allocated_budget ORDER BY department_name DESC, created_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT department_name, SUM(allocated_budget) AS total_budget FROM budget_tracking GROUP BY department_name HAVING SUM(allocated_budget) > 10000
SELECT department_name, expenditure FROM budget_tracking WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY expenditure DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM budget_tracking WHERE department_name = 'HR' OR department_name = 'IT' ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT department_name, AVG(expenditure) AS avg_expenditure FROM budget_tracking GROUP BY department_name HAVING AVG(expenditure) > 5000
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT name, amount, id FROM BudgetAllocations ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT id, name FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE id < 5
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, name, amount FROM Expenditures ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT name, amount FROM BudgetAllocations ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Expenditures WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, amount, description FROM Expenditures WHERE amount > 200 AND description IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, name, amount FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT id, department, allocated_amount FROM BudgetAllocations ORDER BY allocated_amount DESC;
SELECT id, spent_amount, date FROM Expenditures WHERE spent_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM BudgetLogs WHERE action = 'Update' AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT department, SUM(spent_amount) AS total_spent FROM Expenditures GROUP BY department;
SELECT department, allocated_amount FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE allocated_amount > 50000
SELECT * FROM Expenditures WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT action, description FROM BudgetLogs ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT department, allocated_amount, spent_amount FROM BudgetAllocations INNER JOIN Expenditures ON BudgetAllocations.department = Expenditures.department
SELECT department, SUM(spent_amount) AS total_spent FROM Expenditures GROUP BY department
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations ORDER BY allocation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT department_id, SUM(allocation_amount) AS total_allocation FROM BudgetAllocations GROUP BY department_id;
SELECT department_name, department_budget FROM Departments WHERE department_budget > 50000 ORDER BY department_budget DESC;
SELECT expenditure_date, expenditure_amount FROM Expenditures WHERE department_id = 2 ORDER BY expenditure_date ASC;
SELECT id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, department_id, allocation_amount, allocation_date FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 1000 ORDER BY department_id DESC, expenditure_date ASC;
SELECT department_name, department_budget FROM Departments WHERE department_budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations JOIN Expenditures ON BudgetAllocations.department_id = Expenditures.department_id WHERE BudgetAllocations.allocation_amount > Expenditures.expenditure_amount;
SELECT * FROM allocations;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM allocations WHERE budget_amount > 5000;
SELECT expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenditures ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, expense_amount FROM expenditures WHERE department_name = 'HR';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM allocations WHERE department_name = 'Finance';
SELECT id, department_name FROM expenditures WHERE expense_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
